EmailTemplate.name: Trouble w. Form (FS Only)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} Five Star Award Candidate - PDF
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Thank you for following up with me today. I apologize that you are having trouble with the link to the candidate evaluation form. To ensure that you do not experience any further interruptions, I have included the link below to the PDF version of the candidate evaluation for. If you could simply complete the evaluation form and email it back to me, I will see to it that the information is entered right away.
Please Select Profession:
Certified Public Accountant - CPA : Candidate Evaluation Form - PDF
Estate Planning Attorney : Candidate Evaluation Form - PDF
Financial Planner : Candidate Evaluation Form - PDF
Insurance Professional : Candidate Evaluation Form - PDF
If you have any questions please feel free to reach out to me. I am happy to assist you at any time. You can contact me at {!User.Phone}.
Kind Regards
{!User.Name} Research Assistant
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
Reminder: Third party firms may have contacted you suggesting you are an award winner and offering you wall plaques or other products. These firms are in no way affiliated with Five Star Professional.
Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner and provide official award-related products and services. Marketing organizations not affiliated with Five Star Professional do not comply with industry regulatory requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
